name: spectacular
description: Advanced BDD framework for CoffeeScript and JavaScript
author: Cédric Néhémie <cedric.nehemie@gmail.com>

scripts.test: coffee --compile --bare --output lib/ src/ && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > bin/spectacular && cat lib/spectacular_bin.js >> bin/spectacular && chmod +x bin/spectacular && rm lib/spectacular_bin.js && bin/spectacular --coffee specs/**/*.coffee
